cause.description:
Dr. Norman Ernest Borlaug is an agricultural scientist whose work deals with developing high yield crops that are suitable for some of the most drought and famine plagued areas.
His work in Africa, India, China and Mexico has revolutionized farming worldwide.
The direct result of the good doctors work has resulted in billions of people. That's right billions of people not starving to death.
In 1970 he received a Nobel Prize
1. World peace can't be built on an empty stomaches and misery.
2. Norman Borlaug's discoveries sparked the Green Revolution.
3. "Norman is the greatest human being, and you've probably never heard of him."
cause.mission: To get Doctor Norman Borlaug globally recognized as the greatest humanitarian of the last century.
cause.name: Norman Borlaug greatest humanitarian of the 20th centrury.
